Title: Authorizes and directs the department of health and the office for the aging to conduct a study of fees and charges assessed to residents of assisted living facilities
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of health and the office for the aging to conduct a study of fees and charges assessed to residents of assisted living facilities and to make recommendations to the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the study of fees and charges assessed to residents of assisted living facilities
